title: Pharmaceutical sector growth worldwide 2017 - 2030 , by country
summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Growth in percentage in the y axis.
The Growth in percentage is appeared to be the highest at Country India and lowest at Country Japan.
The highest Country India has 115.0 more Growth in percentage than the lowest Country Japan.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Growth in percentage in the y axis.
The Growth in percentage is highest at Country India and lowest at Country Japan.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Growth in percentage in the y axis.
The Growth in percentage is appeared to be the highest at Country India and lowest at Country Japan.
The highest Country India has 115.0 more Growth in percentage than the lowest Country Japan.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Growth in percentage in the y axis.
The maximum Growth in percentage 232.0 is found at Country India and the minimum is found at Japan where Country is 117.0.
Second maximum Growth in percentage is found at Country China.
The highest Country India has 115.0 more Growth in percentage than the lowest Country Japan.
Growth in percentage at Country India is 232.0 , second place is China at 230.0, and thirdly is Indonesia at 196.0.
Similar Growth in percentage is found in Country Spain, and France.
The Country Japan has 1.52 times less Growth in percentage than average.
Summing up the values of all Countrys, we get total 3051.0.
